1455390.name: UBOAT: The Silent Wolf VR
1455390.description:
If you're a fan of role-playing games and simulators or just want to feel the thrill of being a submarine crew member, then the game UBOAT: The Silent Wolf is what you're looking for!

FEEL LIKE A REAL SUBMARINE CAPTAIN


Sea Wolf! Are you ready for an exciting adventure with our game UBOAT: The Silent Wolf? Full speed ahead! This amazing combination of role-playing game and simulator will give you an in-depth experience that will make you feel like a real submarine commander during World War II. Immerse yourself in the VR world, experience the atmosphere of being on a submarine, and fathom the difficulties and perils that crew members encountered during World War II.

TAKE CARE OF YOUR SUB


The game will allow you to fully immerse yourself in the underwater world, where you’ll have to manage your submarine and take care of its systems. Learn how to control the sub. Receive missions from the port, check the condition of your vessel regularly, and give it what it needs to sail safely. Make sure the engine and other components are running like clockwork and the compass is always pointing in the right direction. Remain vigilant and react quickly to any alarming signs, such as a breakdown or damage. Remember that every decision you make is crucial to the survival of your crew!

FACE ENEMY FORCES


Confront challenges from historical naval battles! Look out for the enemy through your periscope, prepare an ambush for them and take on destructive units like the USS Bogue, Dido type cruisers or aircraft like the Bristol Beaufighter. With their realistic representation, you'll feel like you're right in the middle of the largest armed conflict in world history. Set out on thrilling sea voyages and make strategic decisions! Don't let yourself get sunk, and remember that your ultimate goal is survival!

So, will we see you soon on the submarine?

The features of the game include:

  • an advanced submarine control system: taking care of resource levels, traveling, diving, tracking the enemy, periscopes, echolocate, communication: morse, enigma, radio, and much more,
  • the atmosphere of being underwater and the challenges of living aboard a submarine,
  • the complex combat system, faithfully modeled ships and aircraft,
  • visiting the most important ports of World War II,
  • a variety of additional activities and minigames, for example, the torpedo system: loading, aiming, shooting, or the deck gun and anti-air gun.
  • singleplayer mode and multiplayer co-op for up to four players in VR.
